title: Nature: Geography (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Geography subcategory within Nature. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: Mt. Fuji is a very tall mountain.
cards.romaji: Fuji-san wa totemo takai yama desu.
cards.japanese: 富士山はとても高い山です。

cards.english: The longest river in Japan is Shinanogawa.
cards.romaji: Nihon ichi nagai kawa wa, Shinano-gawa desu.
cards.japanese: 日本一長い川は、信濃川です。

cards.english: Sakurajima is a volcano which still has many small-scale eruptions every year.
cards.romaji: Sakura-jima wa, mada, maitoshi ch.sai funka o kurikaeshite iru kazan desu.
cards.japanese: 桜島は、まだ、毎年小さい噴火を繰り返している火山です。
